result.execSummary:
All charges against Ivan E Rodriguez Vale in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Ivan E Rodriguez Vale is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ivan E Rodriguez Vale

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ivan E Rodriguez Vale in court.  Attorney Sam Obscherning in court for Ivan E Rodriguez Vale.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for plea/sentencing hearing.
State informed the Court victim is not cooperative and moves to dismiss. Defense does not object.
On motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed without prejudice. 
Court released any conditions of bail/bond and ordered any bail/bond on deposit to be returned to whoever posted it.

Defendant Ivan E Rodriguez Vale in court with attorney Sam Obscherning.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ivan E Rodriguez Vale appeared by video means with Attorney.
Defense requests resolution date.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.
All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Ivan E Rodriguez Vale in court with attorney Sam Obscherning.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ivan E Rodriguez Vale appeared by video means with Attorney. Defense counsel has received an offer and has not received discovery and requests additional time to review.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.   This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Status conference scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with ERG (DOB 11/9/98)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Ivan E Rodriguez Vale in court with attorney Sam Obscherning.  Defendant Ivan E Rodriguez Vale in custody.  Edward OBrien appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Ivan E Rodriguez Vale appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
